meta.job_title: Senior BI Publisher Developer (Power BI) with PowerApps & Power Automate

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain BI Publisher reports and dashboards using Power BI, Power Apps, and Power Automate.
Utilize XML, XSLT, and Oracle to design and implement data solutions.
Collaborate with the team to implement and optimize BI solutions within the financial services sector.
Utilize AWS and/or Azure for data storage, processing, and visualization.
Utilize Agile Scrum and Kanban techniques to facilitate project management.
Guide, mentor, and assist team members in implementing BI solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Computer Science (Preferred)
